item.text: Moses assembled the whole community of the Israelites and said to them, “These are the things that the Lord has commanded you to do.
In six days work may be done, but on the seventh day there must be a holy day for you, a Sabbath of complete rest to the Lord. Anyone who does work on it will be put to death.
You must not kindle a fire in any of your homes on the Sabbath day.”
Moses spoke to the whole community of the Israelites, “This is the word that the Lord has commanded:
‘Take an offering for the Lord. Let everyone who has a willing heart bring an offering to the Lord: gold, silver, bronze;

<st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet yarn</st>; <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>; <st data-num="05795" class="">goats’ hair</st>;

<st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">skins</st> <st data-num="0119" class="">dyed red</st>; <st data-num="08476" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>;

<st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> for the <st data-num="03974" class="">light</st>; <st data-num="01314" class="">spices</st> for the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> and for the <st data-num="05561" class="">fragrant</st> <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="07718" class="">onyx</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, and other <st data-num="068" class="">gems</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="04394" class="">mounting</st><n id="2" /> on the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> and the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>.
Every skilled person among you is to come and make all that the Lord has commanded:

the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> with<n id="1" /> its <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>, its <st data-num="04372" class="">covering</st>, its <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st>, its <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>, its <st data-num="01280" class="">crossbars</st>, its <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st>, and its <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>;

the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>, with its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st>, the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st>, and the special <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st> that <st data-num="04539" class="">conceals</st> it;

the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> with its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">vessels</st>, and the <st data-num="03899" class="">Bread</st> of the <st data-num="06440" class="">Presence</st>;

the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> for<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03974" class="">light</st> and its <st data-num="03627" class="">accessories</st>, its <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st>, and <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> for the <st data-num="03974" class="">light</st>;

and the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> with its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st>, the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>, and the <st data-num="05561" class="">fragrant</st> <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>; the <st data-num="04539" class="">hanging</st> for the <st data-num="06607" class="">door</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>;

the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> with its <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="04345" class="">grating</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is on it, its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>; the large <st data-num="03595" class="">basin</st> and its <st data-num="03653" class="">pedestal</st>;

the <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>, its <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and its <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, and the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> for the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> to the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>;

<st data-num="03489" class="">tent pegs</st> for the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> and <st data-num="03489" class="">tent pegs</st> for the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> and their <st data-num="04340" class="">ropes</st>;
the woven garments for serving in the Holy Place, the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments for his sons to minister as priests.’”
So the whole community of the Israelites went out from the presence of Moses.

Everyone whose heart stirred him to action and everyone whose spirit was willing came and brought the offering for the Lord for the work of the tent of meeting, for all its service, and for the holy garments.

They came, men and women alike, all who had willing hearts. They brought brooches, earrings, rings and ornaments, all kinds of gold jewelry, and everyone came who waved a wave offering of gold to the Lord.
Everyone who had blue, purple, or scarlet yarn, fine linen, goats’ hair, ram skins dyed red, or fine leather brought them.
Everyone making an offering of silver or bronze brought it as an offering to the Lord, and everyone who had acacia wood for any work of the service brought it.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> who was <st data-num="02450 03820" class="">skilled</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02901" class="">spun</st> with her <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> what she had <st data-num="04299" class="">spun</st>, <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, or <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet yarn</st>, or <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>,
and all the women whose heart stirred them to action and who were skilled spun goats’ hair.
The leaders brought onyx stones and other gems to be mounted for the ephod and the breastpiece,
and spices and olive oil for the light, for the anointing oil, and for the fragrant incense.
The Israelites brought a freewill offering to the Lord, every man and woman whose heart was willing to bring materials for all the work that the Lord through Moses had commanded them to do.
Moses said to the Israelites, “See, the Lord has chosen Bezalel son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah.

He has <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> him with the <st data-num="07307" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>—with <st data-num="02451" class="">skill</st>, with <st data-num="08394" class="">understanding</st>, with <st data-num="01847" class="">knowledge</st>, and in <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st>—

to <st data-num="02803" class="">design</st> <st data-num="04284" class="">artistic designs</st>, to <st data-num="06213" class="">work</st> in <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, in <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, and in <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>,

and in <st data-num="02799" class="">cutting</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> for their <st data-num="04390" class="">setting</st>,<n id="1" /> and in <st data-num="02799" class="">cutting</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, to <st data-num="06213" class="">do work</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04284" class="">artistic</st> <st data-num="04399" class="">craft</st>.<n id="2" />

And he has <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it in his <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="03384" class="">teach</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> and <st data-num="0171" class="">Oholiab</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0294" class="">Ahisamach</st>, of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>.

He has <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> them with <st data-num="02451 03820" class="">skill</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st><n id="2" /> as <st data-num="02796" class="">craftsmen</st>, as <st data-num="02803" class="">designers</st>, as <st data-num="07551" class="">embroiderers</st> in <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet yarn</st> and in <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>, and as <st data-num="0707" class="">weavers</st>. They are<n id="3" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">craftsmen</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="04284" class="">artistic</st> <st data-num="02803" class="">designers</st>.<n id="5" />
